H0.text: Which comedy written by Johnny Speight which first aired in 1965, featured a fervent West Ham supporter. Till Death Us Do Part

H1.text: Which comedy written by Johnny Speight which first aired in 1965, featured a fervent West Ham supporter. Steptoe and Son

H2.text: Which comedy written by Johnny Speight which first aired in 1965, featured a fervent West Ham supporter. Dad's Army

H3.text: Which comedy written by Johnny Speight which first aired in 1965, featured a fervent West Ham supporter. Else Garnett

A4.text: Johnny Speight gained a reputation for late delivery of scripts, sometimes unfinished and still in the form of rough notes (which would be finished and finalised as a script by the script editor and cast during rehearsals), either close to, on, or occasionally past the deadline.
